name: Daydream
detailed_description:
Daydream is a game set in imagination of a child and features time based disconnected dreams. These dreams are inspired from what we see in real life and how such things in reality connect to subconsciousness and results in something that we can relate to. Although as with the dreams they are different and worlds in this game are dreams that has uniqueness of their own.
Gameplay is kind of casual and suits anyone looking for short time based challenges. Other aspects of game includes action and strategy as game becomes harder you need to be good in both of these. You will play those challenges in the child's imagination where you get 5 minutes for each challenge.

    Features:

  • Randomly generated seeds for replay value.
  • Time based challenges placed in 5 unique dream worlds.
  • Skill based gameplay that improves upon while testing your strategy, quick actions, balance and more.
  • 6 impact full music to immerse in the challenges by our artist.
  • Difficulty scaling with respect to time and the last minute being the nightmare of challenge.
  • In game achievements system.

*Please note that game is in early access stage and hence the length of game is kinda short. As we add more content and challenges the game will have more things to hook upon. If you wish to become part of how this game will end or wish to shape it with us then know that you are more than welcome.

In any case DirectX 2010 June redistibutable is needed to work. This will prevent any struggle with crashes.

short_description: An indie game set in the imagination of a child who often gets lost in small daydreams. This causal game features timed disconnected dreams that packs a mix of action, balance, strategy and challenges.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 and above
  • Processor: Dual Core 1 GHz+
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 8600 gt or 520M , AMD equivalent.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9 compatible or anything that you use to listen songs.
  • Additional Notes: Integrated and laptop graphic card equivalent will work fine. Example Intel HD 3000. In any case DirectX 2010 June redistibutable is needed to work..
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 and above
  • Processor: Dual Core 2 GHz+
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 260 GTX, AMD Radeon HD 5000 or better.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9 compatible or anything that you use to listen songs.
  • Additional Notes: Integrated and laptop graphic card equivalent will work fine. Example Intel HD 4000. In any case DirectX 2010 June redistibutable is needed to work..
